attributes.additional_details: Schools across the country have reported averages of 1s-3s being achieved across the country by students who clearly are being pushed to study for an exam that clearly is not fair.
attributes.background: Mock exams across the UK revealed incredibly hard questions that not even some teachers are able to understand across all subjects. Students are expected to memorise impossibly large pieces of information that make the exam simply a memory test.

rejection.details:
Grade boundaries aren't decided by the Government or Parliament. They are set by exam boards.
